title: MGM University to Host ANVESHAN 2025-26 Student Research Convention on October 16, 2025
desc: MGM University is hosting ANVESHAN 2025-26 on 16th October 2025. Students can showcase innovative research projects across multiple disciplines. Register by 9th October 2025.

title: Supreme X Officially Launches
desc: Supreme X announces its official launch as a futuristic innovation collective. Bringing together developers, designers, and thinkers, the team aims to decode the future with cutting-edge technology and bold ideas.

title: Supreme X Unveils Team Portfolio Website
desc: Supreme X has launched its official website featuring team details, gallery, and blog updates. The site serves as the central hub for all communication and showcases Supreme X’s innovation journey.

title: Future Collaboration Opportunities
desc: Supreme X is preparing to announce strategic collaborations with innovators, startups, and institutions to drive next-gen projects. Stay tuned for more updates in the coming months.

title: AI-Powered Innovation Hub
desc: Supreme X is working on an AI-driven hub for developers and innovators to collaborate on futuristic projects with real-world impact.
